LEVEL 24
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 24
By Y.K.TAN on Tuesday, May 14, 2002 - 11:57 pm:

LEVEL 24

At the start of this stage,destroy the box on your right. And go all the way right. A ghost in flying up and down in a column form. Make boxes while avoiding him go all the way up on the metal ledge on the left. On the metal ledge,create a box underneath/left of you. Than walk on it,till the second "hole" Fall down it,when no monsters are around to get the key.Repeat the process from the start of the ghost and create box to win this stage.
